name: Bulbasaur
pokedex_entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

name: Ivysaur
pokedex_entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
pokedex_entry: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
pokedex_entry: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
pokedex_entry: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
pokedex_entry: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
pokedex_entry: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
pokedex_entry: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
pokedex_entry: The jets of water it spouts from the rocket cannons on its shell can punch through thick steel.

name: Caterpie
pokedex_entry: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
pokedex_entry: This Pokémon is vulnerable to Attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: Butterfree
pokedex_entry: In battle, it flaps its wings at high Speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
pokedex_entry: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

name: Kakuna
pokedex_entry: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: Beedrill
pokedex_entry: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
pokedex_entry: Very docile. If Attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.

name: Pidgeotto
pokedex_entry: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

name: Pidgeot
pokedex_entry: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high Speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: Rattata
pokedex_entry: Bites anything when it Attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: Raticate
pokedex_entry: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

name: Spearow
pokedex_entry: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high Speed to stay airborne.

name: Fearow
pokedex_entry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: Ekans
pokedex_entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

name: Arbok
pokedex_entry: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.

name: Pikachu
pokedex_entry: When several of these Pokémon gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: Raichu
pokedex_entry: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.

name: Sandshrew
pokedex_entry: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for prey.

name: Sandslash
pokedex_entry: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to Attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
pokedex_entry: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
pokedex_entry: When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.

name: Nidoqueen
pokedex_entry: Its body is covered with needle-like scales. It never shows signs of shrinking from any Attack.

name: Nidoran♂
pokedex_entry: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

name: Nidorino
pokedex_entry: Its horn contains venom. If it stabs an enemy with the horn, the impact makes the poison leak out.

name: Nidoking
pokedex_entry: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

name: Clefairy
pokedex_entry: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.

name: Clefable
pokedex_entry: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
pokedex_entry: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Ninetales
pokedex_entry: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for a thousand years.

name: Jigglypuff
pokedex_entry: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
pokedex_entry: Their fur feels so good that if two of them snuggle together, they won't want to be separated.

name: Zubat
pokedex_entry: Emits ultrasonic cries while it flies. They act as a sonar used to check for objects in its way.

name: Golbat
pokedex_entry: Its sharp fangs puncture the toughest of hides and have small holes for sucking blood.

name: Oddish
pokedex_entry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: Gloom
pokedex_entry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: Vileplume
pokedex_entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
pokedex_entry: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: Parasect
pokedex_entry: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

name: Venonat
pokedex_entry: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.

name: Venomoth
pokedex_entry: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: Diglett
pokedex_entry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: Dugtrio
pokedex_entry: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth
pokedex_entry: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
pokedex_entry: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Psyduck
pokedex_entry: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

name: Golduck
pokedex_entry: Often seen swimming elegantly by lakeshores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Mankey
pokedex_entry: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

evolution_family.method: Level up after using Rage Fist 20 times

name: Primeape
pokedex_entry: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it catches up.

evolution_family.method: Level up after using Rage Fist 20 times

name: Growlithe
pokedex_entry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: Arcanine
pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: Poliwag
pokedex_entry: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: Poliwhirl
pokedex_entry: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
pokedex_entry: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
pokedex_entry: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.

name: Kadabra
pokedex_entry: It emits Special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

name: Alakazam
pokedex_entry: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: Machop
pokedex_entry: Very powerful in spite of its small size. Its mastery of many types of martial arts makes it very tough.

name: Machoke
pokedex_entry: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
pokedex_entry: One arm alone can move mountains. Using all four arms, this Pokémon fires off awesome punches.

name: Bellsprout
pokedex_entry: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.

name: Weepinbell
pokedex_entry: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

name: Victreebel
pokedex_entry: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.

name: Tentacool
pokedex_entry: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: Tentacruel
pokedex_entry: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: Geodude
pokedex_entry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: Graveler
pokedex_entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: Golem
pokedex_entry: It tumbles down mountains, leaving grooves from peak to base. Stay clear of these grooves.

name: Ponyta
pokedex_entry: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: Rapidash
pokedex_entry: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: Slowpoke
pokedex_entry: Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.

name: Slowbro
pokedex_entry: The shellder that is latched onto Slowbro's tail is said to feed on the host's leftover scraps.

name: Magnemite
pokedex_entry: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses Thunder Wave and similar moves.

name: Magneton
pokedex_entry: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.

name: Farfetch'd
pokedex_entry: The plant stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.

name: Doduo
pokedex_entry: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

name: Dodrio
pokedex_entry: It collects data and plans three times as quickly as other Pokémon. However, it is easily distracted by strong aromas.

name: Seel
pokedex_entry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: Dewgong
pokedex_entry: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.

name: Grimer
pokedex_entry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Muk
pokedex_entry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: Shellder
pokedex_entry: Its hard shell repels any kind of Attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Cloyster
pokedex_entry: For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

name: Gastly
pokedex_entry: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: Haunter
pokedex_entry: By licking, it saps the victim's life. It causes shaking that won't stop until the victim's demise.

name: Gengar
pokedex_entry: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: Onix
pokedex_entry: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

name: Drowzee
pokedex_entry: Puts enemies to sleep, then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

name: Hypno
pokedex_entry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

name: Krabby
pokedex_entry: Its pincers are superb weapons. They sometimes break off during battle, but they grow back fast.

name: Kingler
pokedex_entry: The larger pincer has 10,000-horsepower crushing force. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

name: Voltorb
pokedex_entry: It was discovered when Poké Balls were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

name: Electrode
pokedex_entry: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

name: Exeggcute
pokedex_entry: It is often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and Attack in swarms.

name: Exeggutor
pokedex_entry: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
pokedex_entry: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

name: Marowak
pokedex_entry: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.

name: Hitmonlee
pokedex_entry: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.

name: Hitmonchan
pokedex_entry: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: Lickitung
pokedex_entry: Its tongue spans almost 7 feet and moves more freely than its forelegs. Its licks can cause paralysis.

name: Koffing
pokedex_entry: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

name: Weezing
pokedex_entry: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs, and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.

name: Rhyhorn
pokedex_entry: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

name: Rhydon
pokedex_entry: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: Chansey
pokedex_entry: A rare and elusive Pokémon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch it.

evolution_family.method: Level up with Oval Stone at daytime

name: Tangela
pokedex_entry: Its identity is obscured by masses of thick, blue vines. The vines are said to never stop growing.

name: Kangaskhan
pokedex_entry: Although it's known to be a fierce Pokémon that can easily flatten foes, it seems to often love its child more than anything.

name: Horsea
pokedex_entry: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: Seadra
pokedex_entry: Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

name: Goldeen
pokedex_entry: When it is time for them to lay eggs, they can be seen swimming up rivers and falls in large groups.

name: Seaking
pokedex_entry: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

name: Staryu
pokedex_entry: When the water warms, they inflate the red orbs on their arms and drift languidly on the sea in packs.

name: Starmie
pokedex_entry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: Mr. Mime
pokedex_entry: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

name: Scyther
pokedex_entry: With ninja-like agility and Speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

name: Jynx
pokedex_entry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

name: Electabuzz
pokedex_entry: Normally found near power plants, it can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: Magmar
pokedex_entry: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

name: Pinsir
pokedex_entry: When the temperature drops at night, it sleeps on treetops or among roots where it is well hidden.

name: Tauros
pokedex_entry: They fight each other by locking horns. The herd's protector takes pride in its battle-scarred horns.

name: Magikarp
pokedex_entry: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: Gyarados
pokedex_entry: Once it appears, its rage never settles until it has razed the fields and mountains around it.

name: Lapras
pokedex_entry: A gentle soul that can live for a thousand years. It uses its gentle voice to lull people to sleep.

name: Ditto
pokedex_entry: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

name: Eevee
pokedex_entry: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element Stones.

evolution_family.method: Daytime level up with high friendship
Nighttime level up with high friendship
Level up with high friendship knowing a fairy type move

name: Vaporeon
pokedex_entry: It has evolved to be suitable for an aquatic life. It can invisibly melt away into water.

evolution_family.method: Daytime level up with high friendship
Nighttime level up with high friendship
Level up with high friendship knowing a fairy type move

name: Jolteon
pokedex_entry: A sensitive Pokémon that easily becomes sad or angry. Every time its mood changes, it charges power.

evolution_family.method: Daytime level up with high friendship
Nighttime level up with high friendship
Level up with high friendship knowing a fairy type move

name: Flareon
pokedex_entry: When it catches prey or finds berries, it breathes fire on them until they're well done, and then it gobbles them up.

evolution_family.method: Daytime level up with high friendship
Nighttime level up with high friendship
Level up with high friendship knowing a fairy type move

name: Porygon
pokedex_entry: A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
pokedex_entry: An ancient Pokémon that was recovered from a fossil. It swims by cleverly twisting its 10 tentacles about.

name: Omastar
pokedex_entry: Despite its sturdy shell, its weak to water Attacks. It's always better to just avoid battling it in the water.

name: Kabuto
pokedex_entry: This Pokémon has been regenerated from a fossil. It swims skillfully, but can't breathe underwater.

name: Kabutops
pokedex_entry: In prehistoric times, it swam on the sea floor, eating plankton. Its sharp eyes and quick movements allow it to catch prey.

name: Aerodactyl
pokedex_entry: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

name: Snorlax
pokedex_entry: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.

name: Articuno
pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: Zapdos
pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
pokedex_entry: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to live in volcanoes. It summons firestorms with its fiery wings.

name: Dratini
pokedex_entry: Long considered a mythical Pokémon until recently, when a small colony was found living underwater.

name: Dragonair
pokedex_entry: A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. It is said to have the ability to change the weather.

name: Dragonite
pokedex_entry: It is said that this Pokémon lives somewhere in the sea and that it flies. However, it is only a rumor.

name: Mewtwo
pokedex_entry: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

name: Mew
pokedex_entry: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
